subtitles: 16840 19080 First, there was darkness.
20560 23280 Then came the Strangers.

23320 26000 They were a race
as old as time itself.

27000 29560 They had mastered
the ultimate technology--

29640 34680 the ability to alter
physical reality by will alone.

34680 37240 They called this ability
"Tuning."
38360 40120 But they were dying.

40200 43120 Their civilization was
in decline,

43120 45760 and so they abandoned
their world,

45800 48360 seeking a cure
for their own mortality.

49680 53000 Their endless journey brought
them to a small, blue world...

53080 55080 in the farthest corner
of the galaxy.
56080 57480 Our world.

58480 60400 Here, they thought
they had finally found...

60440 62320 what they had been
searching for.

72720 75440 My name is
Dr. Daniel Poe Schreber.
76400 78000 I am just a man.

78040 80720 I help the Strangers
conduct their experiments.
82200 84240 I have betrayed my own kind.
281160 282920 You are confused, aren't you?

282960 285640 Frightened. That's all right.
I can help you.

285640 287240 -Who is this?
-I'm a doctor.

287240 289840 You must listen to me.
You have lost your memory.

289880 291920 There was an experiment.
Something went wrong.

291960 294040 Your memory was erased.
Do you understand me?

294120 296080 No, I don't understand.
What's going on here?

296080 298800 There are people coming for you
as we speak.

298800 301040 Don't let them find you.
Leave now.
302200 304280 Hello? Are you there?

344720 347120 Hey, Mr. Murdoch,
the Automat called.
347120 348560 Said you left your wallet there.

349560 353040 I suggest you retrieve it, since
you only paid for three weeks,
353080 354800 and they was up 10 minutes ago.
356760 358200 I've been here three weeks?

358200 361240 It's right there
in black and white, Mr. Murdoch.
361280 363640 Day and date.

363640 366800 We make our books like we make
our beds, all neat and tidy.

366800 369720 -I'll take care of it later.
-See that you do.

369720 371800 Only thing makes you a guest
in this joint...
371800 373160 is cash on the barrelhead!

390320 392920 House rules.
Three weeks is three weeks.
392960 395400 No days off for good behavior.

405880 409360 Mr. Murdoch, yes?
Where is he?

409400 412720 He just left
not five minutes ago.

418200 422080 When the rumba rhythm
start to play
422160 424240 Dance with me
424280 427160 Make me sway
427200 431000 Like a lazy ocean hugs the shore
431040 433200 Hold me close
433240 435960 Sway me more

435960 440120 Like a flower bending
in the breeze
440160 442480 Bend with me
442520 445240 Sway with ease

445280 449080 When we dance,
you have a way with me
449120 451480 Stay with me
451480 453960 Sway with me

454720 458600 Hey, sweetie, he said he was
your husband's doctor.
458640 460120 He wanted to speak with you.

482600 484080 -Doctor...
-Schreber.

484120 487960 Please, won't you come in?
You must be Emma Murdoch.

489240 492560 Thank you for coming to see me
on such short notice.
492600 494000 What is this?

494040 497440 A rather crude experiment
designed to further my studies.

497520 501040 I don't understand. You say
you're my husband's doctor,

501080 503480 but he never
mentioned you to me.

503520 506240 The truth is, John has been
coming to see me...
506240 507680 for quite some time.

507680 510880 He had been grappling
with feelings of betrayal...

510960 513880 stemming from
your marital difficulties.

513920 515760 -John told you what happened.
-Yes.

517080 519280 When was the last time
that you saw him?

519320 522080 Three weeks ago.
He packed a suitcase.
522120 524520 He was very angry at me.

524560 527280 I understand how difficult
this must be for you,
527320 528600 but for John's sake,

528640 531480 I would like you to think of me
as your friend, Emma.

531520 535000 It appears that John
has suffered a psychotic break.

535040 538040 -Complete memory loss.
-You can't be serious.

538080 540920 Oh, but I am.
He may be delusional.
540960 542200 Even violent.

543480 547320 If he were to contact you,
you must call me immediately.

547320 549720 Wherever your husband is,
he is searching...
551360 552520 For himself.

562280 566040 Good evening, Mr. Murdoch.
It is Mr. Murdoch, isn't it?
566920 570240 Mr. "J" something Murdoch?

573480 577480 J. Murdoch. What's your name?
Justin? Jerry?

581640 583640 My name's Jason Murdoch.
John Murdoch.

583680 586120 Jake Murdoch. How's it going?
Hi. Jack Murdoch.
592240 593920 Got to get a grip on myself.

617000 620280 I told the guy,
cash on the barrelhead.

620280 623480 I said, "Listen,
three weeks is three weeks."

623480 626920 -Where's our lucky winner?
-Upstairs, sir. Room 614.
628160 629440 The call girl.

633880 636640 -Evening, Husselbeck.
-Inspector Bumstead.
636640 638360 Your lace is untied.
648840 650360 Am I glad you're here, sir.

650400 652920 They say Detective Walenski's
got the heebie-jeebies.

652960 655040 Just take what they give me,
Husselbeck.

684680 687120 -Thanks a lot.
-Excuse me.

689440 691200 -Hello?
-Oh, it's you.

691880 694440 -You left your wallet here.
-When did I do that?

694480 696640 -When you was last here.
-When was that?

696680 699880 When you left your wallet.
Expect me to remember?

705480 708160 -Excuse me!
-No, no, seriously.

724800 726560 -Where you headed, chief?
-Home.
726600 727840 And where's home?

727880 730560 Haven't you mugs got
anything better to do?
730600 732760 I'm just doing my job, May.
732800 734760 There's a killer out there.

734800 737360 Look for him
instead of cooling your heels.
740520 742200 Go on. Get out of here.

754920 757600 What's that make so far?
Six hookers in all?

757600 760400 -I believe so, sir.
-Give the man an "A" for effort.
765640 767840 So, Husselbeck,

767880 774080 what kind of killer do you think
stops to save a dying fish?

774120 775880 -Got me, sir.
-Bumstead.

775920 779120 What took you? This killer's
been running circles around us,
779120 780200 thanks to Walenski.

780240 781960 With all due respect,
Chief lnspector,

782000 784960 I've known Eddie a long time,
and he's a good cop.

785000 787120 Whatever kind of cop
Walenski once was...
787120 789000 he let drift a long time ago.
789040 790760 Let me talk to Bumstead!
790800 792760 Come on! Hold on!

797480 799440 -Get his arm !
-They're watching us!

799480 801640 -On your feet!
-There's no way out!
803000 804640 God, can't you see?

807920 810160 Let me go!
I'm not going to hurt you.

811640 813760 -What was that?
-Walenski.

821800 824840 I'm being punished
for my sins, right?

824840 829000 What did I ever do to inherit
this? Where do you begin?

829000 831880 Well, everything Detective
Walenski committed to paper...
831880 833240 should be here, so--

833320 835760 The only thing that should be
committed is Walenski.

837960 839760 Nothing like
a little healthy paranoia.

846080 849280 I came here to file a missing
persons report for my husband.

849320 852560 -Take it to the front desk.
-They told me to come see you.
854760 856360 His name's John Murdoch.

859280 862520 Do these names mean
anything to you?
863320 865200 Who are these women?

865240 867040 Why are you looking
for my husband?

867080 869240 Are you going to accuse him
of something?

869280 872680 -Maybe. Maybe murder.
-Whose murder?

874040 877160 -Which one?
-All of them.

878520 881680 Mrs. Murdoch, I am sorry.
I didn't mean to alarm you.

881720 884360 I'm sorry that I came.
I just made a mistake.

884400 888040 If you'd please just give me
half a second to explain.
897000 898200 We met before?

899800 902760 If we did,
I hope you're still breathing.
902800 904280 What's your name, honey?

907920 909640 Well, that's
an appropriate name.
917240 918480 I was just thinking.

925200 930040 It seems kind of dangerous...
right now.

930080 931960 How do you know
I'm not the killer?

931960 935080 You don't seem like
the killer type. Why?

936000 938120 You feeling any urges
I should know about?

996560 1000240 So it seems you've discovered
your unpleasant nature.

1000280 1003920 -Who are you?
-We might ask the same question.

1083680 1086720 What is to be done?
This man is dangerous.

1086760 1089760 -It is said he is able to Tune.
-Impossible!

1089800 1092720 We have seen it
with our own eyes.

1092760 1095480 On occasion, the imprinting
does not take.

1095520 1098000 They behave erratically
when they awaken.

1098000 1101520 We find them wandering
like lost children.
1101560 1103600 But this one was different, yes?

1103640 1107280 -What has the doctor to say?
-He has failed to report in.

1107320 1110320 -And Mr. Quick?
-No more Mr. Quick.
1110360 1112880 Mr. Quick...dead, yes.
1116120 1118640 Poor, poor Mr. Quick.
1118680 1121440 Mr. Book...does he know?
1122400 1124400 Should we not know, Mr. Hand?

1125400 1128160 We had hoped to learn more
before sharing with you.

1128160 1131040 We can know nothing
until we possess him.
1131040 1133200 We must have this man.
1138920 1140040 My brand, I hope.
1151840 1153360 I've been worried about you.
1157240 1158520 Are you punishing me?

1159240 1161760 If disappearing is
your way of punishing me,
1161800 1163000 I don't appreciate it.
1163000 1164120 What are you talking about?

1167480 1171160 I found these keys in my pocket,
so I assume I live here.

1173240 1175480 -You supposed to be my wife?
-"Supposed to be"?

1178880 1182720 You really...don't know
who I am, do you.

1183520 1186240 Your doctor called me. He was
worried that this might happen.

1190240 1193840 He gave me his card.
He's desperate to find you.

1201280 1203200 Feel like I'm living out
someone else's nightmare.

1203240 1205920 What happened to me?
Why was I seeing a doctor?
1206480 1207920 I had an affair.
1209760 1211040 You were angry at me.

1214080 1217600 Closing time.
The pool is now closed.
1226920 1229160 Most unfortunate it is...

1229240 1231400 that we were forced
to seek you out here.

1232320 1236320 You know how uncomfortable
we find all this moisture.

1237160 1240320 -I'm sorry. I--
-Failed to report in, yes?

1240360 1243200 I was frightened.
I have a weak heart, you know.

1243200 1246600 Your weakness is not, we think,
an affair of the heart.
1246680 1249240 We found this in his hotel room.

1249280 1252640 Must we reproduce
Mr. Murdoch's memories again?

1252640 1254720 I tried to reprint him,
but he woke up.

1254760 1256840 He knocked the syringe
right out of my hand.

1256920 1260000 -He has no memories, then?
-Only fragments.

1260000 1261480 The procedure,
it was interrupted.

1261480 1264120 I guess it's only a matter
of rounding him up.

1264840 1266440 You have had strays
before, right?

1266520 1270240 This is no stray, Doctor.
This one can Tune.

1270240 1273200 But that's impossible.
Only you have that ability.

1273240 1275440 You will process
another template...
1275480 1277440 of the subject's memories, yes?

1277480 1279000 Of course.
I'll imprint him again.

1280520 1283640 We require them
for a quite different purpose.

1283680 1286360 It's almost midnight,
Dr. Schreber.

1286400 1288160 We'll talk again
after tonight's Tuning,
1288200 1291000 but no more delays, yes?

1291040 1295680 No more inconsistencies
in your behavior.
1297440 1299040 The police were looking for you.
1299040 1301120 I know. I saw the papers.

1301160 1303520 "Killer stalks
city street-walkers."
1307000 1309240 I was with one of those women.

1310720 1313960 -Before I came here tonight.
-I don't understand.

1314040 1318720 I met her outside an Automat.
I guess I wanted to test myself.

1320360 1323680 I wanted to know if I had it
in me to do those things.
1323680 1325120 Maybe I have lost my mind,

1325160 1328040 but whoever I am, I'm still me,
and I'm not a killer.
1333800 1335080 I believe you.

1342400 1344320 -What?
-The car outside.
1344360 1345760 The one you arrived in.

1345800 1348000 It's a cop.
He dropped me off here.
1350080 1351760 I didn't know he was still here.
1355200 1356600 Hold it right there, mister!

1358920 1361800 -Wait. You have the wrong man.
-Stand aside, will you, please?
1361840 1363240 I didn't kill anyone.

1363280 1365480 Right now,
all you are is a suspect.

1365520 1368640 Turn yourself in. I'll listen
to whatever you have to say.

1368640 1370640 You won't believe
what I have to say.

1371720 1374880 -Try me.
-There's someone after me.

1374880 1378440 It's this group of men.
They want me dead.

1378440 1381160 And I don't even know if...
they're not even--

1381200 1383360 Yeah, who's going to listen
to a madman?

1383400 1385800 -Stand aside, Mrs. Murdoch.
-Run!
1389960 1391840 No one ever listens to me.
1397840 1398880 Murdoch, stop!

1440000 1442240 -How much further?
-We're almost there, buddy.

1445640 1447880 You happen to know
the way to Shell Beach?

1447920 1450880 You're kidding! Me and the wife
spent our honeymoon there.

1450920 1453320 All you do is
take Main Street West to...

1456200 1459280 Or is it the Cross...
Now, that's funny.

1459360 1462320 I can't seem to remember
if it's Main Street West...
1462400 1463600 or the Crosstown.

1468080 1471040 I'm sorry, lnspector,
I cannot be of more assistance,

1471120 1473000 but I am running late
for an appointment.

1473040 1475080 Well, I appreciate you
taking the time.

1483440 1485760 There's just one thing
that puzzles me.

1485800 1490160 I've met quite a few murderers
in the course of my work.

1490200 1492800 Murdoch doesn't
strike me as one.

1492840 1495880 Perhaps you are not accustomed
to digging deep enough.

1495920 1498680 Well, I do know when
someone is lying to me, Doctor.

1498720 1502760 Inspector, judging personalities
happens to be my business.

1502760 1504680 Maybe you can give me
a few pointers.

1504720 1508520 Certainly.
Let's take you, for instance.

1508560 1511560 You are a fastidious man.
Driven.
1511600 1513800 Consumed by details.

1513840 1517200 I would say
your life is rather lonely.

1517200 1519720 Good evening, lnspector.
I really must be going.

1561760 1563480 -How is he?
-The same.
1564720 1567240 Walenski? It's me, Frank.
1573360 1574520 Come in, Frank.
1577640 1578800 Close the door.

1586520 1589680 I've been looking through
some of your old reports.
1589720 1591760 It's an interesting case.
1592840 1595920 Kind that make a man's career.

1597560 1601040 -Or break it.
-Yeah. I was on that case.

1601080 1604760 And then what?
What happened then, Eddie?
1604760 1606160 Nothing happened, Frank.

1607160 1609080 I've just been spending time
in the subway,
1609120 1610960 riding in circles.

1611000 1614400 Thinking in circles.
There's no way out.
1616560 1618160 I've been over this entire city.

1622480 1624280 You're scaring your wife
to death, Eddie.
1624320 1625760 She's not my wife.

1627520 1630360 I don't know who she is
or who any of us are.

1630400 1633640 -What makes you say that?
-You think about the past much?
1635600 1637040 As much as the next guy.

1638000 1640640 See, I've been trying
to remember things--

1640720 1643640 clearly remember things
from my past.

1643680 1645760 But the more
I try to think back,

1645840 1648720 the more it all starts
to unravel.
1648720 1649880 None of it seems real.

1649880 1653880 It's like I've just
been dreaming this life,

1653880 1656720 and when I finally wake up,
I'll be somebody else,
1656720 1658640 somebody totally different.

1662840 1664920 You saw something,
didn't you, Eddie.
1666040 1668440 Something to do with the case.

1669040 1672280 There is no case!
There never was!

1672280 1676080 It's all just a big joke!
It's a joke!
1715440 1717120 Tonight's requirements are...
1717200 1720280 12 family photo albums,
1720320 1722680 nine personal diaries,
1724760 1727120 assorted childhood photographs,

1727160 1731160 requisite false l.D.s
and social security cards.
1731200 1733400 These do bring back memories.
1735640 1737840 This one is still warm.

1739680 1742800 The recollections of
a great lover?
1742840 1745040 A catalogue of conquests?
1745720 1747160 We will soon find out.

1748400 1749840 You wouldn't
appreciate that,

1749880 1752960 would you,
Mr. Whatever-your-name is?

1753000 1757120 Not the sort of conquest
you would ever understand.

1760360 1762960 A touch of
unhappy childhood...

1768400 1770880 A dash of
teenage rebellion...
1772400 1775320 And last but not least...

1775360 1777840 a tragic death
in the family.

1788920 1792320 Why does Murdoch not sleep
during the Tuning?

1792400 1796440 Maybe he's a step up
the evolutionary ladder.
1796480 1797680 A freak of nature.

1797720 1800440 He's adapting to survive.
What do you expect?

1800480 1802320 Weren't you looking for
the human soul?

1802360 1804880 Isn't that the purpose
of your little zoo?

1804920 1808120 That's why you change people
and things every night.

1808160 1810880 Maybe you have finally
found what you are looking for,

1810960 1812440 and it's going to bite you
on your--

1816320 1818160 It requires several
of your lifetimes...
1818200 1819800 to master our gifts.

1819840 1821560 The idea that
a simple man...

1821600 1823520 could develop the ability
to Tune is--
1823560 1824640 Absurd, I know.
1824680 1826880 What other explanation is there?
1876840 1878240 Shut it down.

1895960 1898960 Fredrickson says he'll take me
off the night shift.
1899000 1900760 It's about time, dear.
1973760 1975840 Can anyone hear me?
1978880 1981600 Let the Tuning commence.
2134920 2136200 The Goodwins.
2136240 2138160 Charlie, Sylvia,
2138240 2140240 Jane, and little Matthew.
2143920 2146080 Jane and little Matthew.
2175000 2177160 The rich get richer.

2177200 2179200 Probably have
maid's quarters...

2179280 2180560 before the night
is through.
2231960 2233840 Dr. Schreber, I presume.

2236400 2238440 That's no way to greet
a patient, Doctor,
2238480 2240520 if that's what you are.
2241960 2243720 Why is everyone asleep?
2243760 2246040 Please keep your voice down.

2246080 2247920 I can't remember anything.
What have you done?
2247960 2250640 Nothing. I want to help you.

2250680 2253960 We cannot talk here.
If they see us together--

2254000 2256760 I don't care.
I want some answers. Now!

2256840 2259800 Who are they?
Why are they trying to kill me?

2266840 2269800 -You really can do it.
-I did that?

2269840 2272360 Listen to me.
You have their power.

2272400 2274280 You can make things happen
by will alone.
2274320 2275800 They call it "Tuning."

2275880 2277720 That is how they change
the buildings.

2277800 2280200 Just now you acted
out of self-defense,

2280280 2282920 but I can teach you
to control your power.

2282960 2286760 We can stop them.
We can take the city back.

2343440 2345680 He made a terrible impression
for the firm,

2345720 2348440 Iollygagging around
as he did.

2348480 2351200 So I told Fredrickson
I was letting him go.
2351280 2353200 Well you should have, darling.

2353880 2356800 He attacked me.
I don't know where he's gone.

2357280 2361080 Come, Dr. Schreber.
We have much to do.

2365920 2372080 They say that
you're a runaround lover
2373120 2380840 Though you say it isn't so

2383600 2390160 But if you put me down
for another
2391760 2397360 I'll know, believe me, I'll know

2398800 2402160 Tonight's experiment will
take place in these locations.

2402200 2406040 The first subject
shall be imprinted on Avenue M.
2406080 2408960 Mr. Book, there is a problem.
2409040 2410520 There is no Avenue M.

2410560 2412400 We were unable
to complete it.

2412440 2415760 During the last Tuning,
we detected a lack of control.

2415800 2418880 An opposing influence
on the machines?

2418960 2423000 This man Murdoch is
more powerful than we thought.
2423040 2424920 He is becoming like us.
2424920 2428240 So we must become like him.
2429120 2431360 The doctor has done as we asked?

2431400 2434960 The life and times
of John Murdoch, volume two.
2436880 2439360 We must not do this.

2439400 2442640 Murdoch does not possess
these memories, yes?

2442680 2445400 How will his imprint
allow us to find him?

2445440 2448720 Everywhere he goes,
everyone he seeks out...
2448760 2449960 will be known to us.

2450000 2454920 And as he follows the clues,
so shall we follow the memories.
2455000 2457280 But to imprint one of us?
2457320 2459960 Failure has always resulted.

2459960 2463360 What Mr. Hand proposes
is our only option.
2470200 2472000 This may sting a bit.
2511040 2514720 I have John Murdoch in mind.

2516920 2520760 "Found this postcard
among your mother's things.

2520800 2523000 "Brings back memories,
doesn't it?
2523000 2524760 "Stop by sometime.

2524800 2527960 "We'll see if we can't
hook ourselves another mermaid.
2528000 2530200 "Love to Emma. Karl."
2538240 2539840 Karl Harris.

2556640 2559560 Excuse me.
Which way is Avenue C?
2559560 2560800 Try the subway.
2564360 2565800 You got a problem, pal?
2565840 2568560 Been working here long?

2568600 2571800 25 years.
No days off for good behavior.
2595880 2598680 We're looking for John Murdoch.

2631560 2633560 She knows nothing,
Mr. Hand.
2633600 2635360 A dead end, Mr. Wall.

2635400 2638040 We thought his imprint
would let us track him.

2638080 2640480 But instead
we have been brought here.

2640520 2644400 -This is irrational.
-Instincts are irrational.

2644440 2647600 We must follow
where they lead, yes?

2647640 2650760 Mr. Sleep suggests he may go
to places familiar.
2652120 2654080 He does not care about our job.
2654080 2656800 Indulge us, Mr. Hand.
2656840 2659400 If you were Murdoch, yes?
2659440 2662640 If I were Murdoch...

2664360 2667720 I would remember how
my wife had hurt me...
2667760 2669760 by sleeping with another man.

2674480 2677800 I would look for a way
to hurt her in return.

2680680 2685040 Leave me alone with her.
There's work to be done.

2688560 2690600 All change,
platform three.

2694280 2696520 Excuse me, how do I get
to the end of the line?
2696520 2697960 You want the Express.
2710000 2712360 How come the train didn't stop?
2712400 2713640 That's the Express.
2715120 2716960 There's no way out.

2717000 2719680 You can't get out of the city.
I've tried.
2720760 2722760 You're Murdoch, aren't you?

2722800 2724400 The one
they've been looking for.
2724440 2725520 You're not a killer.

2725600 2728160 They set you up with
a fake identity,
2728200 2729760 Iike everyone else here.

2729800 2731680 -Who are you?
-I was a cop.
2731680 2734720 At least in this life I was.
2734720 2737440 They steal peoples' memories.

2737480 2739240 Then they swap them around
between us.

2739240 2741840 I seen them do it,
back and forth...

2741920 2743920 till no one knows
who they are anymore.
2744000 2745200 How do you know all this?

2745280 2746960 Once in a while one of us
wakes up...
2747040 2748360 while they're changing things.

2749280 2751680 It's not supposed to happen,
but it does.
2751720 2753000 It happened to me.
2753640 2755440 They'll come looking for you.

2756560 2758800 Just like they'll come
looking for me.
2760200 2761360 I figured a way out.
2772360 2773560 They were here.
2776960 2779080 This was to be his home.
2781640 2783360 That was when we loved her.
2783400 2785640 This is all well and good,

2785680 2787600 but we require
a more practical link...
2787640 2789600 to his present whereabouts.
2794040 2796040 And I know where to find her.

2804080 2807280 We're very lucky,
when you think about it.

2808360 2810320 To be able to revisit
those places...

2810320 2812240 which meant

4132740 4134500 that makes us different

4134500 4136900 They think they'll find

4187180 4189020 remixed it like paint...

4201420 4204900 so they allowed me to keep

4204940 4206340 because they needed them.

4225220 4227180 Shell Beach. Uncle Karl.

4563380 4565700 Shut it down forever.

4631620 4632900 John, remember.
